featured_projects.name: YangTu
featured_projects.description: A service platform that enables users to order home cleaning and shopping delivery services in a single app. Users can choose to be Jalu (service requester) or Yusa (task performer).
featured_projects.littleNote: Developed within two weeks as part of a six-member team, I was responsible for designing the application architecture and managing the development and deployments of both backend and mobile applications. Balancing a robust backend with responsive interfaces presented challenges, but ultimately led to a rewarding, user-centered outcome.

featured_projects.name: FitMeLook
featured_projects.description: A mobile app using AI to personalize outfit recommendations based on facial features and seasonal color palettes. Tailored for women, this app marries fashion with cutting-edge technology for an engaging user experience.
featured_projects.littleNote: Led the team as project manager, while also collaborating with my partner on backend development and cloud infrastructure. Through problem-oriented data exploration, we designed FitMeLook with iterative AI adjustments to enhance the accuracy of personalized recommendations.

featured_projects.name: Pndk.in
featured_projects.description: An application to shorten your URL. Pndk.in means Pendekin (shorten it in indonesian)

projects.name: YangTu
projects.description: A service platform that enables users to order home cleaning and shopping delivery services in a single app. Users can choose to be Jalu (service requester) or Yusa (task performer). This app provides flexibility and convenience for both parties, creating an efficient and user-friendly experience for daily needs.
projects.littleNote: Developed within two weeks as part of a six-member team, I was responsible for designing the application architecture and managing the development and deployments of both backend and mobile applications. Balancing a robust backend with responsive interfaces presented challenges, but ultimately led to a rewarding, user-centered outcome.

projects.name: FitMeLook
projects.description: A mobile app using AI to personalize outfit recommendations based on facial features and seasonal color palettes. Tailored for women, this app marries fashion with cutting-edge technology for an engaging user experience.
projects.littleNote: Led the team as project manager, while also collaborating with my partner on backend development and cloud infrastructure. Through problem-oriented data exploration, we designed FitMeLook with iterative AI adjustments to enhance the accuracy of personalized recommendations.

projects.name: Idolniso
projects.description: An e-commerce platform designed for idol merchandise. Developed with Next.js, it creates a smooth and engaging shopping experience.

projects.name: Idolstagram
projects.description: A mobile app inspired by Instagram, created for idol fans to connect and share content. Built to learn mobile app development, it provides an interactive experience for users interested in idols.

projects.name: LingoLandSaga
projects.description: A real-time, competitive typing game designed to boost users' typing speed through a fun, interactive environment. Compete with others online to level up your typing skills in real time
projects.littleNote: Collaborating with a partner, I implemented real-time Socket.IO connections to create dynamic and fluid gameplay, significantly enhancing the user experience.

projects.name: Restaurant App

projects.name: Simple Social Media Web App
projects.description: A social media platform designed for people with similar interests. It prioritizes user privacy by allowing members to create custom personas, ensuring a privacy-first experience while connecting with like-minded individuals.
